name: Grilled Tropical Tuna Steaks
author: dakota kelly
summary: These grilled tuna steaks with a tropical twist are a great way to enjoy a relaxing summer-evening cookout out with friends.
ingredients: ½ cup pineapple or other tropical fruit preserves
4 (6 ounce) tuna steaks, about 1 inch thick
directions: To prepare marinade, combine preserves, hoisin, lime juice, cilantro, ginger, and sesame oil in a small bowl
Pour into a resealable plastic bag or glass bowl; toss tuna with marinade to coat
Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil grate
Remove tuna steaks from marinade, shake off excess, and discard remaining marinade
Cook on preheated grill for 4 to 5 minutes per side
Be careful not to overcook - the tuna should be lightly browned on the outside but still slightly pink in the middle
